original_text: When people speak against God's true message, teach them carefully. Help them to understand what is right. Maybe God will change how they think so that they believe the true message.
korean_text: 거역하는 자를 온유함으로 훈계할지니 혹 하나님이 그들에게 회개함을 주사 진리를 알게 하실까 하며

sentences.original_text: When people speak against God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 하나님의 참된 말씀을 반대할 때

sentences.original_text: Help them to understand what is right
Maybe God will change how they think
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 하나님께서 그들의 생각을 바꾸실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that they believe the true message
